entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #60441
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #60440
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60439
  • Blazor WebAssembly fails in Chrome Extensions (Manifest V3) due to reserved _framework folder and hash validation #60438
  • Blazor Hybrid: Blazor is not handling exceptions even inside a try/catch #60437
  • Blazor Server: Writing Cookies via IJSRuntime Fails, Antiforgery Token Decryption Exception #60436
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #60435
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60434
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #60433
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60432
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #60431
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60430
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #60429
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60428
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #60427
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #60426
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #60425
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #60424
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #60423

Closed

  • Nevermind #60422

PullRequests

Created

  • update area owners #60421
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add test coverage for collections of self-referential schemas #60402
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
